list.name: ELECTRIC-SHUFFLE
list.description: Ziggy hits the nearest enemy with lightning strikes every second for x sec. These attacks cost no ammo.
list.descriptionHtml: Ziggy hits the nearest enemy with lightning strikes every second for x sec. These attacks cost no ammo.

list.name: NOW-YOU-SEE-ME
list.description: The next lightning strike also teleports Ziggy to the same location.
list.descriptionHtml: The next lightning strike also teleports Ziggy to the same location.
